title: Importance of MVC
content: MVC allows users to maintain true separatin of concerns.  The code is divided between the Model layer(for data), the View layer(for design) and the COntroller layer(for application logic)

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
content: Authentication means confirming your identity whereas authorization means being allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: ORM simplies the way queries are created in SQL.
